verbose_text: One hypothesis is that the DeltaF508 CFTR defect induces defective acidification of Golgi vesicles, which could decrease activity of pH dependent sialyltransferases, but Verkman, using ratio imaging confocal microscopy with liposomal injection into the lumen of trans-Golgi has provided direct evidence that pH of the trans-Golgi compartment is not altered by CFTR expression and activation [XREF_BIBR].
